verses.name: Luke 22:1
verses.text: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh, which is called the Passover.

verses.name: Luke 22:2
verses.text: And the chief priests and scribes sought how they might kill him; for they feared the people.

verses.name: Luke 22:3
verses.text: Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot, being of the number of the twelve.

verses.name: Luke 22:4
verses.text: And he went his way, and communed with the chief priests and captains, how he might betray him unto them.

verses.name: Luke 22:5
verses.text: And they were glad, and covenanted to give him money.

verses.name: Luke 22:6
verses.text: And he promised, and sought opportunity to betray him unto them in the absence of the multitude.
